mapper.select: SELECT t2.`day` text, count(*) `value` FROM ( SELECT goods_id FROM shigu_goods_tiny_${webSite} WHERE store_id = ${shopId} UNION ALL SELECT goods_id FROM shigu_goods_soldout_${webSite} WHERE store_id = ${shopId} ) t1, goods_bogus_upload_records t2 WHERE t1.goods_id = t2.goods_id AND t2.`day` >= ${day} GROUP BY t2.`day`

SELECT t2.goods_id goodsId, count(*) downNum, max(t2.`time`) lastDownTime, t1.title, t1.pic_url imgSrc FROM ( SELECT goods_id,title,pic_url FROM shigu_goods_tiny_${webSite} WHERE store_id = ${shopId} UNION ALL SELECT goods_id,title,pic_url FROM shigu_goods_soldout_${webSite} WHERE store_id = ${shopId} ) t1, goods_bogus_upload_records t2 WHERE t1.goods_id = t2.goods_id AND t2.`day` >= ${day} GROUP BY t2.goods_id

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT goods_id,title,pic_url FROM shigu_goods_tiny_${webSite} WHERE store_id = ${shopId} UNION ALL SELECT goods_id,title,pic_url FROM shigu_goods_soldout_${webSite} WHERE store_id = ${shopId} ) t1, goods_bogus_upload_records t2 WHERE t1.goods_id = t2.goods_id
AND t2.`day` >= ${day}
